content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.atlasobscura.com/ and search for interesting places to visit. The website provides a directory of unique destinations and stories about places and foods offered by Atlas Obscura. It also mentions upcoming trips, experiences, and courses. Readers can contribute to the Atlas by adding and editing places. The website has several links including Trips, Experiences, Courses, and Places. However, when I executed the command to get hyperlinks, it returned too much output and failed. Then, you gave me a command to google the best resources to learn different languages, which returned 8 different links to explore. After that, you gave me another command to google interesting stories or history associated with the places mentioned on Atlas Obscura website, which returned 8 different links to explore.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.atlasobscura.com/", "question": "What are some of the unique destinations and stories mentioned on the Atlas Obscura website?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The Atlas Obscura website features unique destinations such as the Copper Peak Ski Jump in Michigan, Lilias Adie Grave Marker in Scotland, and Iserhatsche in Germany. The website also offers trips to places such as Tonga and Sweden, as well as courses on topics like experimental perfumery and bird taxidermy. The website's stories cover a range of topics, including the history of airline food, the origins of red velvet cake, and the mystery of the Roman Empire's dodecahedrons. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/)', '\\n\\nTrips\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/trips)', '\\n\\nExperiences\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/events)', '\\n\\nCourses\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/online-courses)', '\\n\\nPlaces\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/all-places-in-the-atlas-on-one-map)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls"}}}'}]
"""
